bundle.shortDescription: Explore and analyze your Snapchat data exports
bundle.longDescription: Snap Data Explorer is a privacy-first desktop application that reconstructs your Snapchat chat history, memories, and media from My Data exports. Features full-text search, media gallery, and conversation browsing.
